import { Props, Story, Preview } from "@storybook/addon-docs/blocks";
import { Header} from '../../Components/Organisms';

# Header

`import { Header, HeaderLeft, HeaderRight, HeaderBody } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Organisms";`


`Header` is a base for header in mobile. <br/>
Consists of `HeaderLeft` for container left side, `HeaderRight` for container right side, `HeaderBody` for container center side component in header.<br/>

## Stories
<br/>

### Header Basic

`HeaderLeft` as container of logo, `HeaderBody` as container of  [SearchBar](/?path=/docs/molecules-search-bar--basic) and `HeaderRight` as container of 2 [Icon](?path=/docs/atom-icon--glyph) right.

<Preview>
  <Story id="organisms-header--basic"/>
</Preview>

## Props
<Props of={Header}/>
